name: Winter is nigh!
description:
Winter is coming! No! It's already here! Give those weird Christmas (and not-so-Christmas) monsters what they deserve by showing Summer is the best season. It's just you, your small but great island, and those evil invaders.

Controls:

  • Press Z to Jump
  • Press X to Shoot
  • Arrow Keys to move.
  • ESC to exit.

Survive as long as you can! Enemies drop powerups randomly, so be ready to take them as soon as you can. Good luck!!
